meanings.sent1: The toast was butterless, so I ate it plain.
meanings.sent2: She made a butterless cake for her dairy-free friend.
meanings.sent3: The butterless popcorn tasted surprisingly good.
meanings.sent4: The butterless kitchen felt incomplete without its usual aroma.
meanings.sent5: The butterless pancakes were a sad sight on the breakfast table.

meanings.sent1: The butterless bread was still delicious with jam.
meanings.sent2: He ordered a butterless croissant to accommodate his dietary restrictions.
meanings.sent3: The butterless mashed potatoes puzzled the dinner guests.
meanings.sent4: The butterless toast seemed naked without its golden spread.
meanings.sent5: The butterless scones lacked the usual richness but were still tasty.
